[b][color=white]The Tank Is Empty[/color][/b] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient posted a thread regarding Bitcoin. He is predicting that BitCoin will drop to around $1300 per Bitcoin within a week. Quote on Quote saying "$1300...you heard it here first." [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5621556]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Massive Rep Kill[/color][/b] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
A good amount of Users were Rep Killed over the last week or so, for getting involved with Group / Gang Repping. Around 9 members were Rep Killed, one of them losing over 2k Reputation. Omni has sure reminded the community that we will not stand for any abuse. 
[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5470739&page=153]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[list][b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[list]No announcements were made this week![/list]

[b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[list][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5618567][b]Let's Fix Bitcoin! | Support Bitcoin Unlimited & Avoid Having Your Coins Disappear[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=564566][b][color=#00AAFF]PiraX[/color][/b][/url]
Very interesting thread on how we, as a community, can help solve the Bitcoin issues.

If we missed your thread in this edition, please report it in our [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5470739]Weekly Reports[/url] thread![/list]

[b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[list][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?pid=54807954#pid54807954][b]Hold your Bitcoin[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2091037][b][color=#FFFFFF]Vittorio[/color][/b][/url]
Vittorio stated, that if Bitcoin was going to drop $100, or higher, that he would then willingly take a six-month vacation ban. He has yet to live up to his claim.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5621009][b]Pretty Sure I Found Bandors[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2883163][b][color=#FFFFFF]Copywriter[/color][/b][/url]
Copywriter has managed to successfully find Bandors – looks like he is not in Thailand after all.
[/list]

[b][color=white][u]Member Feedback & Testimonial Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[list][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5615984][b]Six year anniversary today[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=787112][b][color=white]Tonight[/color][/b][/url]
[/list]

[b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b]

[list][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5617202][b]G*59's UPGRADE CONTEST | $20 BTC | L33T | AWARDS | OPEN TO ALL[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2053689][b][color=#00AAFF]G*59[/color][/b][/url]
Wear a signature until May 21, and have the chance of winning either $20 BTC, L33T or an award valued at $20.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5621307][b]$150 Giveaway | Very Simple to Enter |[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3479077][b][color=white]-Virtuous[/color][/b][/url]
Been in the need of $150? All you have to do is sign up to -Virtuous' forum, and post on his forum, and you are in the raffle of winning $150.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5590332][b]SMM-Panel.com - 300,000 Instagram Likes Giveaway! FREE for everyone ! Take it now :-)[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2562991][b][color=#99FF00]⭐WhatTheJoint⭐[/color][/b][/url]
Wear their signature, post what your favorite social media is, and have the chance of winning between 1,000-100,000 Instagram likes.
[/list]

[b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b]

[list][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5621556][b]The Tank is Empty[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url]
An interesting thread discussing the future of Bitcoin.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5616723][b]Healthcare[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1446449][b][color=#00AAFF]TayterJ[/color][/b][/url]
What is your opinion on how Healthcare should be handled?[/list]
[/list]

[hr]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/uJLfHEY.png[/img]
[color=1E90FF][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview[/font][/size][/color] [color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]-[/font][/size][/color] [size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1107978]Brenton[/url][/font][/size][spoiler=][align=left]

[hr]

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#ffd1dc][b]boxxy[/b][/color][/url]: Hello and welcome to the 342nd edition of the HF News. Before we begin, would you like to make any shoutouts?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1107978][color=#ffffff][b]Brenton[/b][/color][/url]: Shoutout to Pope! My boy, we started on HF together. Shoutout to all the new REKT members. Let's get it!

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#ffd1dc][b]boxxy[/b][/color][/url]: Let's get it. I'd like to first start off the same way I start off every other interview. What brought you to HackForums, and what keeps you coming back and remaining active?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1107978][color=#ffffff][b]Brenton[/b][/color][/url]: It's the community, I joined because all of the buzz around HF. I think the fact that HF is so diverse keeps me here. I joined HF to sell in the social media market, (I don't do that anymore) but still stick around to give back and offer my insight. Lately i've been doing huge member upgrade contests, in February I upgraded 30 members. I feel like this is how we keep the site active. I'm in the innuendo section quite a bit, HF is full of crazy stories and it's a great way to spend my evening after work. People join HF and quickly realize that if they have a legitimate question, they'll get a real answer. That's what I like the most. Let me tell you I am super happy to see the old userbars make a return. As a user that's been here for a while I was excited.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#ffd1dc][b]boxxy[/b][/color][/url]: Very interesting, thank you. We as a community want to keep Hack Forums well and growing, but not everyone can afford to do tons of giveaways. Any other tips or advice for making Hack Forums continue to grow?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1107978][color=#ffffff][b]Brenton[/b][/color][/url]: I definitely agree. It's not something everyone can do. As I said earlier, one of the real benefits of HackForums is getting a real answer when a real question is answered. I believe the site relies on the community, and if we continue to offer our insight and our humor we give HackForums it's best chance. When someone upgrades, they're almost pledging to remain active. Along with this, as users of the forum I feel it's our responsibility to take advantage of the suggestions subforum. Omni is constantly working to make the site better but we also have some very bright minds here and I truly believe if you have an idea that will make HackForums even greater, you should speak up. Now of course along with all of this, promoting HackForums will also lead to growth. You don't need to have money to enjoy HF & you certainly do not have to be a "hacker" to enjoy the community. By spreading the word of the forum, we also bring awareness. At the end of the day, we can only do so much but HackForums is still growing strong and everyday more and more people are finding out about it. To sum it up, I believe it is our responsibility to spread the word and bring awareness. If we do this, we will see growth. We're already 10 years strong! Let's get more members who maybe aren't into selling instagrams and gamer tags. Let's try to get people who join for the lounge and for our gaming forums.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#ffd1dc][b]boxxy[/b][/color][/url]: Yes, I agree well put. 10 years is a great milestone for Hack Forums indeed. You've been here for a bit, do you think Hack Forums as a website/community is progressing or regressing?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1107978][color=#ffffff][b]Brenton[/b][/color][/url]: I think we're progressing. We're adjusting to the changes in the market. HackForums was always really focused on the marketplace & in the recent years its focus has shifted. With the various new currency is coming out we are building discussion in and growing into something that was never present before. we are introducing new user groups in new memberships that we never had and I think that's a sign of progress definitely. I will say that when I first started it did feel a little different I think my focus was different at the time I didn't really look at hack forums as anything other than a marketplace. I think in the way of general discussion we are progressing or form is growing into more of a community where we can talk about anything whether it's something that has to do with health or whether it's music. I even find myself asking motorcycle questions to members that I find. I'm a motorcycle enthusiast and I'm even meeting people who live in California and ride. I'm happy with where we are and where we're are going. As long as we're not at a stand still we're good.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#ffd1dc][b]boxxy[/b][/color][/url]: Hmm indeed we are changing quite a bit. If you could change anything about the website, what would you change?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1107978][color=#ffffff][b]Brenton[/b][/color][/url]: I feel like one of our biggest issues was the lack of respect given to newer users. I feel like this impacts us as a site and as a community. If I could change anything, it would have to do with the way we interact with new members. If we want our site to grow we have to encourage individual growth. Let's face it, many of our members are young. We need to realize this. We're talking about growth and the only real growth on paper comes from number of users and posts. It's easy to take higher power when someone has rep and a userbar. As far as what I would change on the site function wise, I'd love if we were able to safely trade without hassle of a middleman. Omni has introduced it but i'd love to see it. A trading system that one can submit a text file into, prevent scamming and encourage new selling.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#ffd1dc][b]boxxy[/b][/color][/url]: Very good points. I want to switch things up a bit. Have you ever met anyone from Hack Forums in real life, and/or has Hack Forums benefitted you in real life in any way? Explain.
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1107978][color=#ffffff][b]Brenton[/b][/color][/url]: I have not! I've always been down to meet up with people but haven't been successful with setting anything up yet. If y'all are in LA and want to meet up, let's get it!!!! & I've benefitted in HF in a few ways. My first car was bought because of earnings from HF! It was a brand new civic ( nothing special ), but either way i've made money. That's why I give back!

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#ffd1dc][b]boxxy[/b][/color][/url]: That's what's up though, very impressive. Do you have any tips for new users, or just anyone in general trying to earn money here on Hack Forums?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1107978][color=#ffffff][b]Brenton[/b][/color][/url]: The market on HF, as with any market.. fluctuates. To make money you have to be on top of it, you have to know when to invest & when something is going to blow up. With making money online, my biggest advice is to be patient. you'll see your money unfold and grow in front of you.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#ffd1dc][b]boxxy[/b][/color][/url]: Very true, plenty of room for a lot of profit here. Before we wrap this up, thank you for your time and the interview. Is there anything else you'd like to add?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1107978][color=#ffffff][b]Brenton[/b][/color][/url]: I just hope for more future of growth here on HackForums and I'm glad to be a part of the site. thank you for interviewing me!

[/align][/spoiler][/align]

[hr]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/Memo.png[/img][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=small]

[b][color=white]PODCAST![/color][/b]
Check out our new podcast for the week!

Just kidding, full one will be out next week. You'll know what I'm talking about after you watch it.

    
[/size][/font]
[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/Jvg81mQ.png[/img][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=small]

[b][color=white]Uber Adds 'Saved Places' Option to Let You Bookmark Your Favourite Address[/color][/b]
Using app-based cabs has become a part of our daily lives, and there are places many places we travel to, besides our work and home destinations. However, it becomes hard sometimes to recall, or tedious to re-enter the precise locations when calling a cab. Uber has come up with a solution to this problem with a new in-app feature called 'Saved Places.'
Uber's Saved Places highlight will let you bookmark your most loved places and appoint names (and even emojis) to them to guarantee a quicker access to the application. The component is currently accessible on both Android and iOS stages in the US locale and will be taken off to different markets in the not so distant future. [i][size=x-small][url=http://gadgets.ndtv.com/apps/news/uber-saved-places-work-home-feature-launched-1692236]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Playing with Windows 10 Story Remix Video Editor[/color][/b]
Microsoft shocked everybody with another Windows 10 Story Remix highlight prior today. It's a video altering tool that will give you a chance to consolidate photographs and recordings with noteworthy 3D impacts. It was one of the unexpected increments to Microsoft's Build keynote, and now the organization is permitting Windows 10 analyzers to explore different avenues regarding the new app in front of its presentation in the Fall Creators Update later this year. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2017/5/13/15625014/microsoft-windows-10-story-remix-app-test-windows-insiders]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]RHA’s Newest Headphones will Compete Against Apple’s Beats X[/color][/b]
RHA is releasing two new headphones this mid-year, the MA650, and the MA750, and they're both enlivened by Apple's Beats X. Both headphones highlight the adaptable, formed accessory promoted by Apple's most recent headphones, and both accompanied the regular slate of midrange headphone specs including aptX, noise isolation, and 12 hours of playback. The MA650 will cost $99, and the MA750 will come in at $169 — more costlier than the Beats X which appears like an error — when they are released late this summer. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/circuitbreaker/2017/5/13/15630018/rha-headphones-ma650-ma750-apple-beatsx]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

      
[/size][/font]
[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews/Tsundere.png[/img][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=small]

[b][color=white]Halo 6 Won't Be Shown At E3 In June[/color][/b] 
Sorry Halo fans, the next game in the Halo series will not be shown at E3. Devs over at 343 say, "We'll have a little something at E3, but it's not related to the next major entry in the franchise" regarding the matter. If you are wondering why they will not be going to E3, well that is because the next Halo game will not be coming out until sometime in 2018. Same thing goes for Gears of War, Microsoft had said. The only thing that we know about Halo 6 at the moment is that it will feature split=screen multiplayer. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/halo-6-wont-be-shown-at-e3-in-june/1100-6450007/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Madden 18 Cover Star, G.O.A.T. Edition Revealed[/color][/b] 
Have you ever heard of the "Madden Curse"? Pro NFL players who end up on the covers of EA's Madden American football game somehow suffer and get injuries in the following season. Well, the newest game in the Madden series, Madden NFL 18 will be showcasing the Patriot's QB, Tom Brady. Tom Brady says that he does not believe in this curse. Rob Gronkowski, a teammate of Brady, was on the cover of the 2017 edition of the game. The curse had stricken so to speak, and Gronkowski happened to miss the first two games of the 2016 season. The cause of this was a hamstring injury. Think something will happen to Brady? Is the curse real? Madden 18 will be released for the PS4 and the Xbox One and launches on August 25. Besides, there will be a G.O.A.T. edition of the game, which stands for "Greatest of all Time." If you purchase the G.O.A.T. edition of the game, you will get access to it three days earlier on August 23, but those with the EA Access membership and G.O.A.T. edition will get the chance to play it even sooner on August 17! But there is a catch, those who have access to the August 17 access day can only play for 10 hours. Do you believe Tom Brady is the G.O.A.T.? [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/madden-18-cover-star-goat-edition-revealed/1100-6449987/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Xbox One Backwards Compatibility Sale Begins Soon[/color][/b] 
The chance to go back in time to the good ole 360 days is finally here. Microsoft will be having a huge sale on games that are backwards compatible. The feature itself has shown to be very popular among the Xbox One community. The sale will strat on May 16 and more than 275 games will be on sale for 75% off. There is no exact prices at the time for the games, as well as the list of games put on sale, but what you can expect says Gamespot, "Call of Duty: Black Ops II, Red Dead Redemption, Grand Theft Auto IV, and Skate 3." No end date has been announced either so if you have the cash to spend, you might want to stock up on those games. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/xbox-one-backwards-compatibility-sale-begins-soon/1100-6450008/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Nintendo Switch EShop Adds Two More Games Today[/color][/b] 
Priced at $30, Minecraft has finally been released on the Nintendo switch! It offers a singleplayer and multiplayer game mode and even offers you the chance to have a Mario-bassed skinset. You can play as Mario and Luigi and even have a texture pack to support your new adventure as you try and find the beautiful princess in the new world you have discovered. At the moment the game is digital purchase only, but Nintendo does plan on releasing a physical copy of the game. If you have played the PS4 and Xbox version of the game, then it's not that different from that. It will run at 60 FPS, and the multiplayer version of the game will support up to 8 people. The game also offers split screen local play and up to four people can play! Do you believe that the game is still relevant? [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/nintendo-switch-eshop-adds-two-more-games-today/1100-6449960/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[/size][/font]
